/usr/bin/g++    -fopenmp -pthread -g -O2   CMakeFiles/tBlobArray.dir/tBlobArray.cc.o  -o tBlobArray -rdynamic ../src/libblob.so ../../Common/src/libcommon.so -llog4cplus -lpthread -lcasa_casa -lhdf5 -lpthread -lz -ldl -lm -lhdf5_hl -lhdf5 -lpthread -lz -ldl -lm -lm -ldl -lblitz -lcasa_casa -lhdf5_hl -ldl -lblitz -Wl,-rpath,/scratch/software/src/pyimager/build/gnu_opt/LCS/Blob/src:/scratch/software/src/pyimager/build/gnu_opt/LCS/Common/src
